animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat this snack.
🐘 I am a very large animal.
🚿 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈 I am a common pet.

animal.question: I waddle and lay eggs. I say 'Quack!' Who am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I like to swim in ponds.
🐥 Baby me is called a duckling.
🦆 I have a wide, flat beak.

animal.question: I have a fluffy tail and I love to eat nuts. I can climb trees very well. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I like to bury acorns for winter.
🐿️ I am a small, furry animal.
🌳 You often see me in parks.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a cat, but much bigger.
👑 I am at the top of the food chain.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐎 I look like a horse.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. I live in Australia. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I am a marsupial.
🌱 I eat plants.
🇦🇺 I am a symbol of my home country.

animal.question: I am a very slow animal that lives in trees. I am known for my long claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I eat leaves.
😴 I spend most of my life sleeping.
🌳 I live in the rainforest.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 My spots help me camouflage.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🌿 I am the tallest mammal.

animal.question: I am a flightless bird that lives in Antarctica. I can swim very well. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I wear a 'tuxedo'.
🧊 I live in a very cold place.
🐟 I eat fish.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of tiny water droplets.
🌫️ You might not see very far when I'm around.
🌿 I can make grass and plants feel cool.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold.
⛄ You can build with me!
🌨️ I am made of tiny ice crystals.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am a beautiful arc in the sky.
🌞 You need the sun and rain to see me.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🔥 I keep us warm.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I rumble and crash, and sometimes lightning comes with me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡I'm a loud noise during a storm.
🌧️ I often come with rain.
⛈️ You might hear me after you see a flash of light.

weather.question: I can be gentle or strong, and I make the leaves rustle. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make windmills turn.
💨 You can feel me on your face.
🌬️ I am moving air.

weather.question: I'm small and icy, and I fall during a storm. I can hurt if I hit you! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm frozen rain.
🤕 Sometimes I'm as big as marbles!
⛈️ I fall from the sky during thunderstorms.

weather.question: I am a big storm with swirling winds, that forms over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an 'eye' in the center.
🌊 I cause big waves.
🌪️ I can be very destructive.

weather.question: I am a dark, swirling cloud that can cause a lot of damage on land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I look like a funnel.
🚗 I can lift cars!
🏡 You need to take shelter when I am nearby.

weather.question: I am a sudden, dangerous surge of electricity in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a bright flash.
🌳 I can set things on fire.
⛈️ I happen in thunderstorms.
